name: PIG (Ldeets)
description:
My Submission for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. This was my first Game Jam. This is a very simple version of the dice game Pig. Try to get a high score by continuously rolling a die! If you roll a one its game over! 

Controls:

Press Space to roll die

Press ESC to exit game

Thanks to all that play, even for 10 seconds! This was my first Game Jam. I started work 4 hours after it started. I learned a ton, not only about programming but my workflow and time management too. It was lots of fun! I'm already looking forward to my next Game Jam
